doc.previous: Baden-Powell died on 8 January 1941 and is buried at St. Peter's Cemetery in Nyeri.[45] His gravestone bears a circle with a dot in the centre "Ê", which is the trail sign for "Going home", or "I have gone home":[46] When his wife Olave died, her ashes were sent to Kenya and interred beside her husband. Kenya has declared Baden-Powell's grave a national monument.[47]
